name: ELEX WooCommerce Discount Per Country
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
It will be a pleasant little surprise for customers if you offer a discount based on the shipping state/country they have chosen on the Checkout page. The ELEX WooCommerce Discount per Country Plugin allows you to offer discounts on your WooCommerce store based on the shipping country chosen by customers.

Features

  • Apply Percentage Discount Based on Shipping Country or shipping state.
  • Customize the Discount Label on Checkout Page.
  • Enable or Disable the Discount at Any Time.
  • Restrict the Discount based on the dates.

ELEX Premium Plugins You May Be Interested In

  • WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin
  • Wholesale & Role Based Pricing
  • WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products, Prices & Attributes
  • ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods
  • ELEX Address Validation & Google Address Autocomplete Plugin for WooCommerce
  • ELEX WooCommerce Shipping Calculator, Purchase Shipping Label & Tracking for Customers
  • WooCommerce Google Shopping Integration

ELEX Services

If you have any custom requirement on ELEX WooCommerce Choose Your Delivery Date, please feel to contact ELEX Development Services explaining your business case.
If you have any queries please contact ELEX support

About ELEXtensions

We, Team ELEXtensions are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it ! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.6
  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 9.1

1.1.2

  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.5
  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.9

1.1.1

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.6
  • Made Compatible with Multi-site

1.1.0

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.2
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.4
  • Made compatible with HPOS
  • Made compatible with PHP 8.2

1.0.9

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.8

1.0.8

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.5
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.2
  • Included language files for Dutch and German
  • Fixed an issue related to decimal values being set under discount

1.0.7

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.1
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.1

1.0.6

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 6.7

1.0.5

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 6.6
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.0

1.0.4

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 6.4

1.0.3

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 6.1
  • Made compatible with WordPress 5.9

1.0.2

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 5.9

1.0.1

  • State selection,date restriction features were added [ WordPress timezone must be local timezone]
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 5.8

1.0.0

  • Initial Push
